item.title: Xbox is hosting a Developer Direct later this month, featuring Fable, Forza, and more
item.content:encoded:
Microsoft has announced another Developer Direct, set to take place on the 22nd January. It'll feature Fable, Forza, and Beast of Reincarnation.

As for exact timing, eager spectators can tune in to this Developer Direct at 10am Pacific / 1pm Eastern / 6pm UK on the official Xbox YouTube channel to watch it live.

What exactly will be shown off remains largely a mystery, though the official Xbox Wire post announcing the show states we'll be seeing the "first in-depth look" at Beast of Reincarnation since its reveal last June at the Xbox Showcase.

There will also be a "deep dive" into Forza Horizon 6, with a focus on gameplay and reveals of new features. It'll also dive into the Japanese setting, which apparently will be the "Most fulL" integration of a real world setting yet, prior info indicates.

Fable gameplay will also be present, something desperately sought after since its initial reveal all the way back in 2023. The game made a mostly cinematic appearance in 2024, with a few glimpses of gameplay sprinkled throughout. But a proper lenghty gameplay deep dive, with UI and all the trimmings, has been on the top of people's wants ever since. Those desires will seemingly be met on the 22nd.

Are you going to watch it live? Let us know below!
